mapper.select: SELECT B.FRIEND_SE,(SELECT USER_NAME FROM SNS_USERINFO WHERE USER_EMAIL = B.FRIEND_SE) AS "USER_NAME" ,(SELECT USER_PHOTO FROM SNS_USERINFO WHERE USER_EMAIL = B.FRIEND_SE) AS "USER_PHOTO" ,(SELECT USER_NUM FROM SNS_USERINFO WHERE USER_EMAIL = B.FRIEND_SE) AS "USER_NUM" FROM SNS_USERINFO A, SNS_FRIEND B WHERE A.USER_EMAIL = B.FRIEND_RE AND B.FRIEND_RE = #{userEmail}
